Function reference

All functions

Two-Arm Bandit Task

  • bandit2arm_delta

4-armed bandit task (Seymour et al 2012, J Neuro) w/o C (choice perseveration)

  • bandit4arm_4par

4-armed bandit task (Seymour et al 2012, J Neuro) w/o C (choice perseveration) but with xi (noise)

  • bandit4arm_lapse

  • dd_cs

  • dd_exp

  • dd_hyperbolic

  • estimate_mode

  • extract_ic

Hierarchical Bayesian Modeling of Decision-Making Tasks

  • hBayesDM
  • hBayesDM-package

Compute Highest-Density Interval

  • HDIofMCMC

Iowa Gambling Task

  • igt_pvl_decay

Iowa Gambling Task (Ahn et al., 2008)

  • igt_pvl_delta

Iowa Gambling Task

  • igt_vpp

Function to plot multiple figures

  • multiplot

General Purpose Plotting for hBayesDM. This function plots hyper parameters.

  • plot.hBayesDM

Plots the histogram of MCMC samples.

  • plotDist

Plots highest density interval (HDI) from (MCMC) samples and prints HDI in the R console. HDI is indicated by a red line.

  • plotHDI

Plots individual posterior distributions, using the stan_plot function of the rstan package

  • plotInd

Print model-fits (mean LOOIC and WAIC values) of hBayesDM Models

  • printFit

  • prl_ewa

  • prl_fictitious

  • prl_rp

Risk Aversion Task

  • ra_noLA

Risk Aversion Task

  • ra_noRA

Risk Aversion Task

  • ra_prospect

Function for extracting Rhat values from an hBayesDM object

  • rhat

Norm-Training Ultimatum Game

  • ug_bayes

Norm-Training Ultimatum Game

  • ug_delta
